attributes.action: More funds and support for women experiencing pregnancy loss and miscarriage.
attributes.additional_details: I think this is very important theres not enough help and support.our nurses are allready overstretched as it is.
attributes.background: I would like to see more funding to maybe open somewhere to give these ladies privacy to grieve in peace.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Fund improved services for families experiencing baby loss.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/624047
